title: FT T206 Cobb Bat On Shoulder SGC 20 TRADED
author: Piratedogcardshows

posts.post_title: FT T206 Cobb Bat On Shoulder SGC 20 TRADED
posts.post_content: Hello.Im looking to either sell or trade this Ty Cobb T206 Bat On Shoulder.It has been graded a 20 by SGC.The card has staining and a crease through Cobb's right arm.Im asking for delivered which is currently below VCP average.Paypal gift or add 3%.Check or money order is fine as well.Im also willing to trade it for a nice T210 or two.Please contact me anyway thats best for you.Thanks.Jason

The only cobb i need to complete my cobb set,  it is bad my wallet is empty at this time hehe 

Hope you will find a deal here on your cobb 

Great card
